docs.title: Speedcubing Algorithms
docs.text: A collection of speedcubing algorithms and notes.

docs.title: Methods
docs.text: Currently focusing on CFOP, but planning to expand to other methods.

docs.title: CFOP (Cross, F2L, OLL, PLL)
docs.text:
The most popular speedcubing method that solves the cube in four steps:

  • Cross: Form a plus sign on the bottom face
  • F2L: First Two Layers - 42 algorithms to solve corner-edge pairs
  • OLL: Orient Last Layer - 57 algorithms to orient the top face
  • PLL: Permute Last Layer - 21 algorithms to position pieces correctly

docs.title: Sections
docs.text:
• F2L - First Two Layers (42 algorithms)
  • OLL - Orient Last Layer (57 algorithms)
  • PLL - Permute Last Layer (21 algorithms)

docs.title: F2L (First Two Layers)
docs.text: Solve the first two layers of the cube simultaneously with these intuitive algorithms.

docs.title: PLL (Permute Last Layer)
docs.text: Permute the last layer pieces to their final positions with these 21 algorithms spread across 3 groups.
